about_the_game:
◆Featured Systems

◇Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.

◇Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

◆Story

What happened? I…
…What happened? I looked down; my big belly had disappeared. Where was my 30-year-old big belly?
Why am I so slim? Could it be… I've crossed over to an alien world? I’ve been reborn?
Nonsense. It’s not one of those cheap, cheesy novels in which you get hit by a car and reincarnate in a different world...

So, you saved me?
Well, sort of. I’m the one who reconstructed your face and took care of you.
So why did you save me? Am I some chosen one who’s supposed to save the world?
Ah? No. You’ve got some nerves…

You said yourself that if someone saved you, you’d do anything.
Firstly, the bill. After a 10% discount, it’s 20 million. Here's the receipt. Your fingerprints are also stamped on it.
What? You’re asking for money? And it’s way too much, isn't it? You're a scam! You must have stamped it on me while I was in a coma!
Then you can help me collect "love" until you’ve collected enough to cover your debts.

Oh... I’ll do anything to pay off my debts... Although I don't understand what you mean by "collect love"...
...Well, then, I had to get back to my life and find a job again. After all, I had to eat and pay my debts...
With so many changes in my appearance, many things had to change as well, such as clothing, and so on...
Anyway, let’s keep going…

Well, actually, let’s… start my new life!!!

◆Gameplay Instructions

This game is a first-person perspective AVG.
Players will take on the role of a fat geek who has been in a car accident and put in a coma for six months, and who starts a life courting the women around him.
To play the game, try getting back to work and spending time with different girls. You can explore their private lives and learn their secrets.
There are 6+2 girls in the game to get to know.
You can develop a relationship with them individually and discover what they don’t want other people to know about.
Once you have collected enough “love”, you will face a choice. What will become of you?

◆Game Features

◇33 basic CGs, including more than 500 differences.

◇Game text: 110,000 words.
◇Visual Novel Game.
◇Endings: 3 different kinds.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: My Newborn Life In A Harem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: One day, after a woman cheated on you, you got desperate and got killed by a truck… Then, a demoness with horns on her head saved you and changed your face… But you had a debt of 20 million dollars! You had no choice but to help this girl with horns collect "love". But what was "love"?
supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, English, French, German, Russian, Korean, Spanish - Spain
